scripts.deploy: run-s build deploy:edge deploy:cloudfront upload:cloudfront invalidate:cloudfront
scripts.deploy:edge: sam package --template-file template-edge.yaml --output-template-file packaged-edge.yaml --s3-bucket $(jq -r .DeployEdgeBucketName parameters.json) && sam deploy --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --template-file packaged-edge.yaml --stack-name $(jq -r .StackName parameters.json) --region us-east-1 --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides $(jq -r 'to_entries[] | "\(.key)=\(.value)"' parameters.json)
scripts.deploy:cloudfront: aws cloudformation deploy --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --template-file template.yaml --stack-name $(jq -r .StackName parameters.json) --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameter-overrides $(jq -r 'to_entries[] | "\(.key)=\(.value)"' parameters.json) EdgeFunctionArn=$(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name $(jq -r .StackName parameters.json) --region us-east-1 | jq -r '.Stacks[].Outputs[] | select(.OutputKey=="LambdaFunctionVersion") | .OutputValue')
scripts.upload:cloudfront: aws s3 sync public s3://$(jq -r .CloudFrontBucketName parameters.json)
scripts.invalidate:cloudfront: aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $(aws cloudformation describe-stacks --output json --stack-name $(jq -r .StackName parameters.json) | jq -r '.Stacks[].Outputs[] | select(.OutputKey=="CloudFrontDistributionId") | .OutputValue') --paths '/*'
scripts.show-url: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --output json --stack-name $(jq -r .StackName parameters.json) | jq -r '.Stacks[].Outputs[] | select(.OutputKey=="URL") | .OutputValue'
